description: Manage a policy assignment's non-compliance messages.

commands.name: az policy assignment non-compliance-message create
commands.summary: Add a non-compliance message to a policy assignment.
examples: az policy assignment non-compliance-message create -g MyResourceGroup -n MyPolicyAssignment -m 'Resources must follow naming standards'
az policy assignment non-compliance-message create -g MyResourceGroup -n MyPolicySetAssignment -m 'Resources must use allowed SKUs' --policy-definition-reference-id SkuPolicyRefId

commands.name: az policy assignment non-compliance-message delete
commands.summary: Remove one or more non-compliance messages from a policy assignment.
examples: az policy assignment non-compliance-message delete -g MyResourceGroup -n MyPolicyAssignment -m 'Resources must follow naming standards'
az policy assignment non-compliance-message delete -g MyResourceGroup -n MyPolicySetAssignment -m 'Resources must use allowed SKUs' --policy-definition-reference-id SkuPolicyRefId

commands.name: az policy assignment non-compliance-message list
commands.summary: List the non-compliance messages for a policy assignment.
examples: az policy assignment non-compliance-message list -g MyResourceGroup -n MyPolicyAssignment
